name: Heaven Snakes [Beta]
description:
A new generation of a Snake arcade game fully in 3D and online😍!
Stay alive, grow and become the top 1 snake on the server 🐍!
Use new mechanics to absorb enemies, control your character and have fun 🎮!

Eat food to grow, use a boost to speed up, paying for this your length, create a shape by your tail and use your ability to create a locked space and try not to lose 👾!

Early Beta
The game is in the early beta. Lags, errors, bugs, crashes and etc. are possible. Many features will be released with updates. Sorry for the inconvenience.
